General.Name: Kimia Farma Persero Tbk
General.Description: PT Kimia Farma Tbk engages in the manufacturing and sale of pharmaceutical products and herbal medicines in Indonesia. The company operates through Manufacturing, Distribution, Retail, and Other Services segments. It provides generic, ethical, license and narcotic medicines, over the counter medicines, raw materials, medicines, medical devices, and cosmetic products, as well as rapid test diagnostic tools. The company is also involved in the manufacturing and marketing of pharmaceutical raw materials and active pharmaceutical ingredients; health foods and effervescent tablets; quinine salt and related derivatives; and castor oil and edible oil. In addition, it retails and distributes pharmaceutical products. The company also exports its products to Asia, Europe, Australia, Africa, and the United States. PT Kimia Farma Tbk was founded in 1817 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
